sentence.text: Identification of second-generation P2X3 antagonists for treatment of pain.
A second-generation small molecule P2X3 receptor antagonist has been developed
The lead optimization strategy to address shortcomings of the first-generation preclinical lead compound is described herein

These studies were directed towards the identification and amelioration of preclinical hepatobiliary findings, reducing potential for drug-drug interactions, and decreasing the projected human dose of the first-generation lead
